body.p:
Head-Quarters Provost Marshal,
EIGHT DISTRICT, KENTUCKY.
London Jan 19th 1864
Gov Bramlett
Dear Sir

this day the 86th Ohio six month men passed through this place forcibly taking with them a Slave belonging to Col John G Eve Armsted Parrot & Milton Eve of Knox and William M'Hayne of Laurel and various other Slaves of Knox & Laurel their time has expired and these slaves who all belonged to Loyal Union men some, & them were taken by their owners and the agints of their owners from this regment and were retaken by this command can they not be prevented from takeing them from this State to Ohio can you cause these slaves to retained
for the benefit of their owners and these men ^who have commited these depradations^ arrested for their misconduct
P S they were commanded by Leutenant Col McFarland
